item.title: The Word of Wisdom
item.description:
The Word of Wisdom by Elder Eduardo Ayala, Of the Seventy given in Saturday Morning of 160th Semiannual General Conference on Sun Sep 30 1990
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: Elder Eduardo Ayala, Of the Seventy

item.title: We Have Kept the Faith
item.description:
We Have Kept the Faith by Elder Eduardo Ayala, Of the Seventy given in Saturday Afternoon of 165th Annual General Conference on Fri Mar 31 1995
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
